meanings.definition: Allotters: those who allocate or distribute something
meanings.sent1: The allotters carefully divided the snacks among the children.
meanings.sent2: The allotters at the charity event shared the donations equally.
meanings.sent3: The allotters decided to give each student a different colored pencil.
meanings.sent4: The allotters were like fairies, spreading gifts to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The allotters were like busy bees, buzzing around and sharing resources.

meanings.definition: Allotters: the act of assigning or distributing something to a particular person or group
meanings.sent1: The allotters of tasks made sure each team member had a role.
meanings.sent2: The allotters of prizes handed out the awards with a smile.
meanings.sent3: The allotters of chores made a game out of who got what job.
meanings.sent4: The allotters of responsibilities were like captains of a ship.
meanings.sent5: The allotters of duties were like puzzle masters, fitting each piece perfectly.
